entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
This weekend, there was a massive house party in Jackson that had an estimated 700 people – and which took nearly the entire Jackson Township police force to break up.

We don’t even know yet how many new coronavirus cases may ultimately be the outcome of this party.
